item.title: Brightxf
item.description: Brightxf performed by: jb-williams !! Run at Own Risk !! No issues have come from my use of these but that doesn’t mean there won’t be I enjoy making/finding the most minimal gui and still be functional as a daily-driver(functional specifically to my needs). I tend to prefer cwm, a simple window manager, and sxhkd, used as a hot-key daemon, and I test my setup on several different laptops of different specs.
